values: A clerk is a type of worker. Clerks in a store help customers.
The clerk added up her bill for the groceries.
n. 职员，办事员；店员；书记；记账员；<古>牧师，教士

vi. 当销售员，当店员；当职员
To clerk is to work as a clerk, typically in a store or office.
A clerk is a person who works in an office or a store and is responsible for keeping records or serving customers.
